text: Duván Andrés Vergara Hernández (9 September 1996) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as a forward for América de Cali. ==Career== ===América de Cali=== On 16 July 2019 it was confirmed, that Vergara had joined América de Cali on a one-year loan from Argentine club Rosario Central with an option to buy.Official: Duván Vergara signed with América de Cali, colombia.as.com, 16 July 2019 In December 2019, América triggered the option and bought him free from Rosario for the 2020 season.ASÍ LE PAGARÁ AMÉRICA A ROSARIO CENTRAL LOS DERECHOS DE DUVÁN VERGARA, antena2.com, 23 December 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Envigado F.C. players Category:Rosario Central footballers Category:América de Cali footballers Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina
title: Duván Vergara
